Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.subcmd

package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.subcmd
Provides all supported pub subcommands except pub global which do nothing when execute it on JVM.
Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
  • Subcommands documentation on offical Dart website.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd
    A java package that handles needs for executing pub commands.
    xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.annotation
    Annotate Class in pub command package and it's subpackages to give special operation.
    xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options
    Contains pub subcommand or global option with feature.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractedPubSubCommand
    An abstracted PubSubCommand that does not require any arguments to applied.
    PubAddSubCommand
    A subcommand for add name of the package into current project.
    PubCacheSubCommand
    A subcommand for managing package cache in local machine.
    PubCacheSubCommand.CacheAction
    An Enum for applying action on PubCacheSubCommand.
    PubDepsSubCommand
    A subcommands that print dependency graph for a package.
    PubDowngradeSubCommand
    A subcommands that downgrade named packages to lower version.
    PubGetSubCommand
    A subcommand that getting all dependencies' information in pubspec.yaml.
    PubOutdatedSubCommand
    A subcommand that printing outdated dependencies in current package.
    PubPublishSubCommand
    A subcommand that publish package to repository.
    PubRemoveSubCommand
    A subcommand that the name of the package will be removed.
    PubSubCommand
    An object representing subcommands in pub.
    PubSubCommandWithArgs
    Subclass of PubSubCommand that allow parsing arguments when executing suncommand.
    PubTokenSubCommand
    A subcommand that configure given repository URL token that using for publish.
    PubTokenSubCommand.TokenAction
    An Enum for applying action when executing PubTokenSubCommand.
    PubTokenSubCommand.TokenVarOption
    Exclusive PubOption for PubTokenSubCommand that to indicate which environment variable uses to apply subcommand.
    PubUpgradeSubCommand
    A subcommand that upgrade all outdated packages to the latest one.
    PubUploaderSubCommand
    A subcommand that grant or revoke non-package owners to upload package to repository.
    PubUploaderSubCommand.UploaderOption
    An option that allows applied email address user can be uploaded or not.
